Name: Spark Tie
LongDescription: May restore the PP of one of the Pokémon's moves upon taking damage. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Minun.  You can get a Spark Tie at the Croagunk Swap Shop by swapping: a Minun Tail, a Minun Card, and a Volt Heart. That's the easy way!  An item with a ☆☆☆-rarity rating is very hard to get. It's beyond valuable!
